definition: stick/club/cudgel/smart/capable/strong/wonderful/classifier for legs of a relay race

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
banging away clumsily in all directions with no overall vision
pinyin: dong1 yi1 lang2 tou2 xi1 yi1 bang4 zi5

definition: erhua variant of 棒子麵|棒子面[bang4 zi5 mian4]

sentences.english: It really is the best nominee who connects this club.
sentences.chinese: 實在是接這一棒子的最佳人選。

sentences.english: I mistook the stick for a snake.
sentences.chinese: 我把那根棒子錯看成蛇了。

sentences.english: Look at the bar and look at the wire.
Angry crowds and RouZi looking for bonzi team conflict to keep order.
sentences.chinese: 激憤的羣衆與肉孜找來維持秩序的棒子隊發生衝突。

sentences.english: They need bigger sticks and bigger carrots.
sentences.chinese: 他們需要更大的棒子，更大的胡蘿蔔。

sentences.english: We need bonzi. Should buy out mcgrady's contract.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要棒子，我們應該買斷麥迪的合同。

sentences.english: Nothing but rabbit tobacco. Pa smokes it in a corn cob .
sentences.chinese: 他把一段玉米棒子挖空，然後裝上菸葉。

sentences.english: He had finished gouging out a cob.
sentences.chinese: 他剛挖空一隻玉米棒子。

sentences.english: My husband told me I just can get one corn from one plant.
sentences.chinese: 我老公告訴我每顆玉米植物只能得到一個玉米棒子。

sentences.english: Fill the cone with ice cream, and then a scoop on top.
sentences.chinese: 然後往蛋筒裏裝滿雪糕並插上一根棒子。

sentences.english: All I saw was a stick above the water.
sentences.chinese: 只看到一根棒子浮在水面上。

sentences.english: It upsets the trade balance, they are holding the stick but no carrots.
sentences.chinese: 這打破了貿易平衡，他們高舉着棒子卻沒有獎勵品。

sentences.english: With no Bonzi, Snyder, or Yao, we're not deep.
sentences.chinese: 沒有了棒子，施耐德，姚明，我們一點都沒有深度。

sentences.english: David stabbed the horse with a staff.
sentences.chinese: 大衛用一根棒子戳那匹嗎。

sentences.english: This pet rabbit makes a meal of corn on the cob.
sentences.chinese: 這隻寵物兔子正在享受一根玉米棒子。

sentences.english: It is often served simply as steamed or boiled cobs, or removed from the cob and lightly fried.
sentences.chinese: 它往往只是清蒸或水煮棒子，或從芯和輕炸。

definition: wooden club (used to beat clothes in washing)
to swing (one's arms, a heavy object)/to wave (a sword, one's fists)/to fling (money)
